amendment.description: Amendment authorizes the establishment of a National Clearinghouse for Teacher Entrepreneurship to encourage teacher interest and involvement in entrepreneurship education.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 7 printed in H.Rept. 106-240 to establish the National Clearinghouse for Teacher Entrpreneurship.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
